diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Massive GI bleed, Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, Metabolic encephalopathy and dementia, Acute Upper Extremity DVT, possible acute stroke
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with vomiting and jaundice, had elevated lipase levels, and ultrasound findings indicating a distended gallbladder with sludge, supporting the diagnosis of gallstone pancreatitis.
